akn:section.akn:heading: Homeland Security Science and Technology Advisory Committee

akn:content.akn:p: § 1002. Homeland Security Science and Technology Advisory Committee The Under Secretary for Science and Technology shall utilize the Homeland Security Science and Technology Advisory Committee, as appropriate, to provide outside expertise in advancing cargo security technology. (Pub. L. 109–347, title III, § 302(c), Oct. 13, 2006, 120 Stat. 1921.)
